An individual post follows.

Update: Multichannel Audio Follies

[Updated update] Greg St’Peter at M-Audio wrote today, refuting what I had heard over the phone from his company, saying:

“Alexander, you are absolutely correct [about not being able to pre-listen simultaneously on the Ozone]. The reason for this is because the Ozone is only a two channel output device. you need a four channel output card to do pre listening. Since the headphone jack is not a separate output, this functionality is not available.”

Well, nuts.

—Feb 07, 2003
